alert.note: Alert for Charlevoix; Cheboygan; Emmet (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:42AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cheboygan, southern Emmet and Charlevoix Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 141 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Good Hart to near Fishermans Island State Park. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Stutsmanville around 150 AM EDT. Charlevoix and Harbor Springs around 155 AM EDT. Ironton, Petoskey State Park and Bay View around 200 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Conway, Horton Bay, Oden, Bayshore, Boyne City, Alanson, Brutus, Young State Park, Petoskey, Burt Lake, Indian River, Clarion, Topinabee, Walloon Lake, Burt Lake State Park and Reasoners Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
